name: Trailer Trashed
description:
Trailer Trashed

Trailer Trashed is a fun and challenging game that balances time, points, and hand eye skill. The challenge is to create as much damage as you can with a tornado, sacrificing humans will cost points but gain time.

Sacrifice humans for extra time, but be warned it costs more points.

Keep your tornado alive by regenerating over a water source.

WASD to move and mouse movement controls the camera.
